title: Tell us: are you taking part in US protests against racism and police brutality?
summary:
In Chicago, protests are expected to take place on Friday after body-cam video footage appeared to show a police officer fatally shooting 13-year-old Adam Toledo.
On Thursday, people took to the streets to protest the death of 20-year-old Daunte Wright, who was fatally shot by police in Minnesota.
The protests highlight the continuing problem of police killings of people of color in the US.
If you are taking part in protests, we would like to hear from you.
